attributes.comment:
Once again we see the discriminatio factor raise it's ugly head. Most of the citizen
that are in a position to pay these fees are LEGAL US citizens, who by no fault of
their own are trying to adopt a child to have a family life. Their are numerous fees
and hoops that adoptive parent must jump through just to adopt and legally bring a
child in to the United States. But where are the fees that are being sought after for
the daily influx of illegal border crossings from Mexico, Hati, and of course Cuba.
When the discrimination stops and everyone pays a share, then the fee schedule
will be fair.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Msgt M. Wilson
